prompt: Calculate of a waste of the plate (is a number 0 to 100, 100 all food in the plate  0 no food in the plate ). The formula is: waste = FoodArea / (plateArea - GarbageArea). FoodArea: The area on the plate occupied by the food items; plateArea: The total surface area of the white plate; GarbageArea: The area on the plate occupied by garbage. Garbage is not food. Respond only the result of the model.
